name: MEC WB Wallet
description: From the water-resistant coating, to the built-in RFID shield and the luggage-grade zipper, this travel wallet offers everyday practicality no matter what part of the globe you're trotting.Made of polyester with a water resistant coating.Aluminum RFID shield layer sandwiched between lining and outer fabric prevents information theft from chipped cards or documents.Clamshell access to the main compartment uses a luggage grade YKK zipper.6 card slots.Large zippered pocket for coins.Three interior sleeves hold documents or bills.
